attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Astma, is a life treatening desease, It kills hundreds of people each year. There are poeple in the Uk, who have severe astma, and on low budgets. and require 1-4 inhalers of different types, and also other medication. Some people just cannot afford to purchase all there required medication, and their condition becomes more severe causing suffering, and in some cases causes death.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
